title: Sign Language on Social Media
description: A 60-second lesson on Sign Language on Social Media.

hook.text: TikTok and Instagram gave sign language more visibility in five years than a century of activism did.

buildup.text: Deaf creators gained millions of followers by teaching signs, sharing stories, and performing comedy.

climax.text: But overall, social media has done more for sign language awareness than any previous effort.

punchline.text: A visual language finally found its perfect medium: the video screen.

quiz.question: How has social media affected sign language visibility?
